productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.6 4.6 out of 5 stars 4,046 ratings 4.6 out of 5 stars

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is an awesome motherboard. I have had mine for 3 years so I got another for my nephews first pc I built him. It has 2 m.2 slots so great for upgrades. Havnt had any problems with it. The bios is simple. Updating it was easy as well. My only gripe isn’t the mobo but the rgb polyamorous software. It is garbage. But the motherboard is great. Highly recommended for am4

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I used this as a basis for my dad's workshop PC build, and it works just fine! Was a tiny bit nervous about going for a more "budget" brand, but honestly it gets the job done, and I would definitely get ASRock products again if I wanted to save a few bucks. Motherboards are one place where it's really easy to overspend on features you don't actually need. ASRock comes in clutch with more than good enough products for a reasonable price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 18, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best all around board at this price point for looks and performance, rgb controller works fine now!
reviews.reviewText: Was very happy with this board especially at this price.Pros:Looks goodWorks goodUefi is ok, easy to OC everythingThe vrm heatsinks are good, stays acceptably coolGood I/O selection (has USB type C, plenty of USB 3Decent audioCons:Hmmmmmmmmm....Well first, the "polychrome" software is CRAP, but if your savvy you will eventually get it to work. But for me I finally got everything aRGB synched, the fans, the ram, the board etc, then the very next day the boards LEDS and everything synched to it wouldn't turn on. After a semi competent conversation with asrock, it seems the RGB controller itself is no longer working, so I no longer am able to sync anything and the Mobo lights just don't work. CRAP. JUST AFTER WARRANTY.If you use the lower of the two M.2 slots (the SATA one), be aware it shares it's SATA lane with SATA port #3, so you cannot plug an SSD/HDD into SATA port 3 AND have a SATA M.2 installed, it's one or the other, so if you plan to use that m.2 port you effectively lose one of the few SATA ports. Not sure if that's on all boards or what but it's kind of lame.No wifi option, I bought a good adapter and Intel WiFi/Bluetooth m.2 card, works great ($30)This is still the best looking board at this price, however the asrock quality should be a topic of consideration if you really care about the aRGB stuff. I will have a really hard time picking asrock in the future.EDIT:SO after a year, i finally decide to try asrocks ploychrome asrrgbled cant decide on name software, and guess what. Firmware updates automatically after starting up the program, and guess what happened? Go ahead, after reading my review, guess. MOBO LIGHTS! Are back on. Check out my review on the cpu cooler ive used the entire time, its the UpHere 5v argb one, you'll see my pictures there. I highly recommend that cooler and matching case fans.I give this board a bump from 3-5 stars for full functionality. It's asrocks software that should get 1 star.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 20, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Pretty good with a few cons.
reviews.reviewText: Edit : bios options don't stick properly, will likely need an update. Ui doesn't display properly on 4k screen. Also due to the power phase design im assuming the stepping for ram voltage is pretty pathetic .05v jumps. I usually opt for higher end with more phases so I probably should have expected that on this one. Still a downside no doubt.Nice matx board with everything you need. Bought it to stick a 2600x in, works great without issue. Supports 3200mhz ballistix sport, haven't tried oc'ing but works at xmp speed.Had an issue with the polychrome argb utility, but after uninstalling then reinstalling through the app center it worked fine.Plenty of fan headers along with 2rgb and an arbg header. Huge plus on a matx board. Many of the others I looked at only had 2 fan headers.Two m.2 drives are a huge pro as I put this in a case with limited space. NOTE - the bottom m.2 is sata only and the upper one is nve only (almost sent the board back before recognizing this).I won't be using any other significant features with this board so I won't try to speak to them.Other than that it looks great, works for my needs. I actually bought this off the warehouse as they were out of New ones at the time. Was a bit worried, but didn't find anything wrong with it. I will say the ui is a bit crappy, but other than that I find it pretty difficult to find anything negative to say. I'm happy with it, if you're looking for a decent b450 this one fits the bill.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Brilliant !It worked very well from the day I installed it, I have been using it daily for more than a year, I have adapted different components to it and the quality in general is excellent...Genial !Funciono muy bien desde el dia que la instale, llevo mas de un año usándola a diario, le he adaptado diferentes componentes y la calidad en general es excelente...

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 27, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good motherboard for a great price.
reviews.reviewText: Let's start with the the downside. The one problem I have with this motherboard is the "second" m.2 slot. It doesn't work unless you have a SSD plugged into one of the hard drive slots. Now this motherboard is really cool. I love the lighting and the colors on it. The black, white, and silver all mix with my black and white build. It has plenty of fan plugs, has 4 hard drive slots. The rear I/O does have some dinosaur ports but 7 USB and 1 USB C port it has plenty of room for anything you would like to plug in.(EDIT: The second m.2 slot is a SATA 3 m.2 drive. So do not buy a normal nvme.)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Artículo en excelente estado, concuerda con la descripción de la tienda, tiene buena calidad, cumple a cabalidad con su función y además tiene un buen empaquetamiento que protegió el producto. Se los recomiendo para los que estén interesados.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great Mobo, Sexy as hell camo design
reviews.reviewText: Bought two of these for two computers i built for friends. Great rgb quality on board. Lots of headers.Great mobo overall highly recommend when its on sale.

O produto veio muito rápido, demorou mais o menos uma semana para chegar e minha residência, moro no nordeste. Produto veio atualizado para o Ryzen 5 5600g. Não tive nenhuma problema( ele demora um pouco para dar video na primeira vez, é normal. Recomendo!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the Netherlands on February 6, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: Absolutely a 10/10 mb, works with 5000series cpu out of the box
reviews.reviewText: I bought this motherboard and a r5 5600x as a replacement for a i7 from 2015 and a mini atx mb. I was a bit worried the mb would not be updated to 3.6 (required for 5000 series) out of the box and that i had to update it with an older gen cpu. This was not the case at all, was 3.6 out of the box. Im glad i bought this mb, it looks good and has great performance.

Muy buena tarjeta madre, ya viene lista para ryzen 3000 no hay que actualizar bios, aunque hay que esperar una actualización de bios para corregir que al apagar el pc se apague la iluminación esa sería la una falla que le e encontrado y que la bios no es la más intuitiva, pero todo lo demás es excelente, se ve bastante sólida y es muy bonita el color es muy llamativo, habia visto un video donde dice que tienen problemas de interferencia en el sonido y la verdad no es mi caso tiene un buen sonido, otra cosa que me gusto es que tiene varias entradas para ventilador mi antigua tarjeta solo tenía dos y tenía que agregar adaptadores molex para conectar más ventiladores con esta tarjeta pude conectar 3 sin ningún problema. Es excelente la estoy usando con un ryzen 5 3600.Edit 1: he encontrado en el bios la opción de apagar la iluminación led cuando el equipo está apagado, esta en configuración avanzada >configuración de medios>turn on onboard LED in S5 solo basta con deshabilitar y se soluciona.
